snippet: In a repeat of a controversy that erupted in a New York City suburb in December, The Bangor Daily News asked for public records that included the names and addresses of concealed-weapon permit holders.
abstract: Controversy erupts after Bangor Daily News in Maine asks for public records that include names and addresses of concealed-weapon permit holders.
lead_paragraph: In a repeat of a controversy that erupted in a New York City suburb in December, The Bangor Daily News asked for public records that included the names and addresses of concealed-weapon permit holders.

headline.main: Maine: Uproar Over Request for Gun Permit Data
headline.print_headline: Maine: Uproar Over Request For Gun Permit Data
